headline: APA Corporation Announces Third-Quarter 2024 Financial and Operational Results
summary: HOUSTON, Nov. 06, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- APA Corporation (Nasdaq: APA) today announced third-quarter 2024 results. Results can be found on the company’s website by visiting www.apacorp.com or investor.apacorp.com. To discuss the results, APA will host a conference call on Nov. 7 at 10 a.m. Central time via the webcast link available on the company website. Following the conference call, a replay will be available for one year on the “Investors” page of the company’s website. About APA APA Corp
